document_data.name: Irlon Shulstarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Irlon Shulstarr''' was an evil adventurer in [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Irlon was a member of the [[Masked Marauders]].
document_data.Personality: Irlon was a talented salesman and an able calligrapher, forger, and maker of inks and cosmetics. He was cocky and cruel.
document_data.Relationship: Irlon traveled with his sister [[Llurella Shulstarr]].
